attributes.action: Car insurance in UK is against the human right and it is very discriminating
attributes.additional_details:
Car insurance companies shouldn't ask, 
1.when came to the UK when licence was issued in UK
2.what is your job, job nothing to do with car insurance
3.work industry what work industry has to do with car insurance
4.mileage my property i decide how much i will use
5.address we all live in UK same town should be treated equally
6.where to keep when to drive, where gonna park and what time i 
  gonna drive day or night.
7.value of the car, if expensive high if cheap still high.
8.why you will drive
attributes.background: we want government and Parliament to do is to set some boundaries for the Car insurance companies to insure the car just the car they shouldn't be discriminating and work according to the human and equality rights and measure risk according to individual history not research data.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. This is a matter for insurance companies.

If you think illegal discrimination is taking place, you can find information on action to take here:

https://www.equalityhumanrights.com/en
